name: WDF vs Hydrants
description:
ZFX-Action XIV one week game jam

"A shooter where you destroy dark and dangerous extraterrestrial skyscraping hydrants to save the world."

Non-realistic 3D jet shooter. Destroy towers by shooting at red cubes, don't collide. Use mouse to steer, space for shooting, W for turbo.

3 demo missions with different jet settings, 1st mission contains a slideshow story.
